notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: S.C.B. conceptualized and planned the review; S.M. summarized epidemiological efforts to quantify different aspects of Zika; P.R. summarized the review for vaccine design; T.D. did the computation of the Zika genome data for the gR values for all 310 sequences available; M.V. performed clustering analysis of ZIKV sequences; S.C.B., S.M., A.N., A.K.B. wrote the manuscript.
